hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite in the dawn prayer on Friday:" Alif-Lam-Mim, Tanzil" in the first rak'ah, and in the second one:" Surely there came over the man a time when he was nothing that could be mentioned

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقْرَأُ فِي يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be recited on Friday
